message: It's impossible to fail if you learn from your mistakes
author: Steve Jobs

message: Patience is a key element of success
author: Bill Gates

message: In a gentle way, you can shake the world
author: Mahatma Ghandi

message: Work hard, have fun, make history
author: Jeff Bezos

message: I don't care they stole my idea, I care they don't have any of their own
author: Nikola Tesla

message: I praise loudly. I blame softly.
author: Catherine II of Russia
